from setuptools import setup, find_packages


[docs]def readme():
    with open('README.rst') as f:
        return f.read()



if __name__=='__main__':
    setup(name='fishergw',
          version='0.0.2',
          description='A Python package to compute Fisher matrices for gravitational wave models',
          long_description=readme(),
          url='https://github.com/costa-pacilio/fishergw.git',
          author='Costantino Pacilio',
          author_email='costantinopacilio1990@gmail.com',
          license='MIT',
          packages=find_packages(),
          install_requires=[
              'numpy',
              'sympy',
              'scipy',
          ],
          include_package_data=True,
          zip_safe=False)

fishergw
